Tameka Norris, nke a makwaara dị ka
Dedeaux-Norris na Meka Jean bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Norris na-eji ihe osise, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na nka arụmọrụ iji mepụta ọrụ gbasara njirimara agbụrụ na ọhụụ na enweghị ike ịhụ ihe ojii n'otu ógè site na omenala ọdịbendị na ọha mmadụ nke oge a. Ọrụ ya na-akatọ ọnụnọ nke ahụ ojii na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke eserese na nka márá mma.

Norris gụrụ akwụkwọ na Santa Monica College na Santa Monica, California, wee kwaga UCLA School of the Arts and Architecture na 2007. Norris gàrà n'ihu nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Yale School of Art na 2012
Norris bụ ónyé enyemaka prọfesọ na Mahadum Iowa

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture (2009) ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ébé óbíbí ndị na-ese ihe gụnyere MacDowell Colony (2016) na The Fountainhead Residency Ọ bụ Fellow na Grant Wood Art Colony site na 2016 Ō 2017.
E depụtara Norris dị ka otu n'ime "24 Artists to Watch na 2013" site na magazin Modern Painters
